: Installs <code md-src-pos="6454..6468">mod_spelling</code>
.</li>
<li md-src-pos="6470..6528">
<a href="#apachemodssl" md-src-pos="6472..6507">
<code md-src-pos="6473..6491">apache::mod::ssl</code>
</a>
: Installs <code md-src-pos="6518..6527">mod_ssl</code>
.</li>
<li md-src-pos="6529..6611">

<code md-src-pos="6532..6553">apache::mod::status</code>

.</li>

<h4 md-src-pos="7600..7620">Private Classes</h4>
<ul md-src-pos="7622..8303">
<li md-src-pos="7622..7682">
<code md-src-pos="7624..7648">apache::confd::no_accf</code>
: Manages the <code md-src-pos="7662..7676">no-accf.conf</code>
 file.</li>
<li md-src-pos="7683..7759">
<code md-src-pos="7685..7714">apache::default_confd_files</code>
: Helper for setting up default conf.d files.</li>
<li md-src-pos="7760..7834">
<code md-src-pos="7762..7784">apache::default_mods</code>
: Installs and congfigures default mods for Apache</li>
<li md-src-pos="7835..7879">
<code md-src-pos="7837..7854">apache::package</code>
: Installs an Apache MPM.</li>
<li md-src-pos="7880..7936">
<code md-src-pos="7882..7898">apache::params</code>
: This class manages Apache parameters</li>
<li md-src-pos="7937..7989">
<code md-src-pos="7939..7952">apache::php</code>
: This class installs PHP for Apache.</li>
<li md-src-pos="7990..8056">
<code md-src-pos="7992..8007">apache::proxy</code>
: This class enabled the proxy module for Apache.</li>
<li md-src-pos="8057..8114">
<code md-src-pos="8059..8075">apache::python</code>
: This class installs Python for Apache</li>
<li md-src-pos="8115..8175">
<code md-src-pos="8117..8134">apache::service</code>
: Installs and configures Apache service.</li>
<li md-src-pos="8176..8236">
<code md-src-pos="8178..8191">apache::ssl</code>
: This class installs Apache SSL capabilities</li>
<li md-src-pos="8237..8303">
<code md-src-pos="8239..8256">apache::version</code>
: Try to automatically detect the version by OS</li>
</ul>
<h3 md-src-pos="8305..8322">Defined types</h3>
<h4 md-src-pos="8324..8349">Public Defined types</h4>
<ul md-src-pos="8351..9487">
<li md-src-pos="8351..8476">
<a href="#apachebalancer" md-src-pos="8353..8390">
<code md-src-pos="8354..8372">apache::balancer</code>
</a>
: This type will create an apache balancer cluster file inside the conf.d
  directory.</li>
<li md-src-pos="8477..8569">
<a href="#apachebalancermember" md-src-pos="8479..8528">
<code md-src-pos="8480..8504">apache::balancermember</code>
</a>
: Defines members of <code md-src-pos="8549..8569">mod_proxy_balancer</code>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="8570..8696">
<a href="#apachecustom_config" md-src-pos="8572..8619">
<code md-src-pos="8573..8596">apache::custom_config</code>
</a>
: Adds a custom configuration file to the Apache server's <code md-src-pos="8677..8685">conf.d</code>
 directory.</li>
<li md-src-pos="8697..8869">
<a href="#apachefastcgiserver" md-src-pos="8699..8748">
<code md-src-pos="8700..8725">apache::fastcgi::server</code>
</a>
: Defines one or more external FastCGI servers to handle specific file types. Use this
  defined type with <code md-src-pos="8855..8868">mod_fastcgi</code>
.</li>
<li md-src-pos="8870..9029">
<a href="#apachelisten" md-src-pos="8872..8905">
<code md-src-pos="8873..8889">apache::listen</code>
</a>
: Adds <code md-src-pos="8912..8920">Listen</code>
 directives to <code md-src-pos="8935..8947">ports.conf</code>
 that define the
  Apache server's or a virtual host's listening address and port.</li>
<li md-src-pos="9030..9171">
<a href="#apachemod" md-src-pos="9032..9059">
<code md-src-pos="9033..9046">apache::mod</code>
</a>
: Installs packages for an Apache module that doesn't have a corresponding
  <code md-src-pos="9136..9164">apache::mod::&lt;MODULE NAME&gt;</code>
 class.</li>
<li md-src-pos="9172..9259">
<a href="#apachenamevirtualhost" md-src-pos="9174..9225">
<code md-src-pos="9175..9200">apache::namevirtualhost</code>
</a>
: Enables name-based virtual hosts</li>
<li md-src-pos="9260..9293">
<a href="#apachevhost" md-src-pos="9262..9293">
<code md-src-pos="9263..9278">apache::vhost</code>
</a>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="9294..9401">
<a href="#apachevhostcustom" md-src-pos="9296..9341">
<code md-src-pos="9297..9320">apache::vhost::custom</code>
</a>
: A wrapper around the <code md-src-pos="9364..9387">apache::custom_config</code>
 defined type.</li>
<li md-src-pos="9402..9487">
<a href="#apachevhostfragment" md-src-pos="9404..9453">
<code md-src-pos="9405..9430">apache::vhost::fragment</code>
</a>
: Define a fragment within a vhost</li>
</ul>
<h4 md-src-pos="9489..9515">Private Defined types</h4>
<ul md-src-pos="9517..9913">
<li md-src-pos="9517..9586">
<code md-src-pos="9519..9547">apache::default_mods::load</code>
: Helper used by <code md-src-pos="9564..9586">apache::default_mods</code>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="9587..9635">
<code md-src-pos="9589..9602">apache::mpm</code>
: Enables the use of Apache MPMs.</li>
<li md-src-pos="9636..9709">
<code md-src-pos="9638..9668">apache::peruser::multiplexer</code>
: Checks if an Apache module has a class.</li>
<li md-src-pos="9710..9788">
<code md-src-pos="9712..9740">apache::peruser::processor</code>
: Enables the <code md-src-pos="9754..9763">Peruser</code>
 module for FreeBSD only.</li>
<li md-src-pos="9789..9913">
<code md-src-pos="9791..9820">apache::security::rule_link</code>
: Links the activated_rules from <code md-src-pos="9853..9876">apache::mod::security</code>
 to the respective CRS rules on disk.</li>
</ul>
<h3 md-src-pos="9915..9933">Resource types</h3>
<ul md-src-pos="9935..9979">
<li md-src-pos="9935..9979">
<a href="#a2mod" md-src-pos="9937..9954">
<code md-src-pos="9938..9945">a2mod</code>
</a>
: Manage Apache 2 modules</li>
</ul>
<h3 md-src-pos="9981..9994">Functions</h3>
<ul md-src-pos="9996..10605">
<li md-src-pos="9996..10123">
<a href="#apacheapache_pw_hash" md-src-pos="9998..10047">
<code md-src-pos="9999..10023">apache::apache_pw_hash</code>
</a>
: DEPRECATED.  Use the function <a href="#apachepw_hash" md-src-pos="10079..10114">
<code md-src-pos="10080..10097">apache::pw_hash</code>
</a>
 instead.</li>
<li md-src-pos="10124..10244">
<a href="#apachebool2httpd" md-src-pos="10126..10167">
<code md-src-pos="10127..10147">apache::bool2httpd</code>
</a>
: Transform a supposed boolean to On or Off. Passes all other values through.</li>
<li md-src-pos="10245..10357">
<a href="#apachepw_hash" md-src-pos="10247..10282">
<code md-src-pos="10248..10265">apache::pw_hash</code>
</a>
: Hashes a password in a format suitable for htpasswd files read by apache.</li>
<li md-src-pos="10358..10482">
<a href="#apache_pw_hash" md-src-pos="10360..10395">
<code md-src-pos="10361..10377">apache_pw_hash</code>
</a>
: DEPRECATED.  Use the namespaced function <a href="#apachepw_hash" md-src-pos="10438..10473">
<code md-src-pos="10439..10456">apache::pw_hash</code>
</a>
 instead.</li>
<li md-src-pos="10483..10605">
<a href="#bool2httpd" md-src-pos="10485..10512">
<code md-src-pos="10486..10498">bool2httpd</code>
</a>
: DEPRECATED.  Use the namespaced function <a href="#apachebool2httpd" md-src-pos="10555..10596">
<code md-src-pos="10556..10576">apache::bool2httpd</code>
</a>
 instead.</li>
</ul>
<h3 md-src-pos="10607..10621">Data types</h3>
<ul md-src-pos="10623..10844">
<li md-src-pos="10623..10719">
<a href="#apacheloglevel" md-src-pos="10625..10662">
<code md-src-pos="10626..10644">Apache::LogLevel</code>
</a>
: A string that conforms to the Apache <code md-src-pos="10701..10711">LogLevel</code>
 syntax.</li>
<li md-src-pos="10720..10844">
<a href="#apacheoidcsettings" md-src-pos="10722..10767">
<code md-src-pos="10723..10745">Apache::OIDCSettings</code>
</a>
: <a href="https://github.com/zmartzone/mod_auth_openidc/blob/master/auth_openidc.conf" md-src-pos="10769..10844">https://github.com/zmartzone/mod_auth_openidc/blob/master/auth_openidc.conf</a>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 md-src-pos="10846..10855">Tasks</h3>
<ul md-src-pos="10857..10922">
<li md-src-pos="10857..10922">
<a href="#init" md-src-pos="10859..10874">
<code md-src-pos="10860..10866">init</code>
</a>
: Allows you to perform apache service functions</li>
</ul>
<h2 md-src-pos="10924..10934">Classes</h2>
<h3 md-src-pos="10936..10969">
<a name="apache"></a>
<code md-src-pos="10961..10969">apache</code>
</h3>
<p md-src-pos="10971..11032">When this class is declared with the default options, Puppet:</p>
<ul md-src-pos="11033..11519">
<li md-src-pos="11033..11155">
Installs the appropriate Apache software package and <a href="#default_mods" md-src-pos="11088..11128">required Apache modules</a>
 for your operating system.</li>
<li md-src-pos="11156..11289">
Places the required configuration files in a directory, with the <a href="#conf_dir" md-src-pos="11223..11252">default location</a>
 determined by your operating system.</li>
<li md-src-pos="11290..11395">
Configures the server with a default virtual host and standard port (<code md-src-pos="11361..11365">80</code>
) and address (<code md-src-pos="11380..11384">\*</code>
) bindings.</li>
<li md-src-pos="11396..11490">
Creates a document root directory determined by your operating system, typically <code md-src-pos="11479..11489">/var/www</code>
.</li>
<li md-src-pos="11491..11519">Starts the Apache service.</li>
</ul>
<p md-src-pos="11521..11621">If an ldaps:// URL is specified, the mode becomes SSL and the setting of LDAPTrustedMode is ignored.</p>
<h4 md-src-pos="11623..11636">Examples</h4>
<h5 md-src-pos="11638..11644"></h5>
<pre><code class="language-puppet" md-src-pos="11646..11679">class { 'apache': }
</code></pre>
<h4 md-src-pos="11681..11696">Parameters</h4>
<p md-src-pos="11698..11759">
The following parameters are available in the <code md-src-pos="11744..11752">apache</code>
 class:</p>
<ul md-src-pos="11761..14892">
<li md-src-pos="11761..11812">
<a href="#allow_encoded_slashes" md-src-pos="11763..11812">
<code md-src-pos="11764..11787">allow_encoded_slashes</code>
</a>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="11813..11850">
<a href="#apache_version" md-src-pos="11815..11850">
<code md-src-pos="11816..11832">apache_version</code>
</a>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="11851..11876">
<a href="#conf_dir" md-src-pos="11853..11876">
<code md-src-pos="11854..11864">conf_dir</code>
</a>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="11877..11912">
<a href="#conf_template" md-src-pos="11879..11912">
<code md-src-pos="11880..11895">conf_template</code>
</a>
</li>

<code md-src-pos="11916..11927">confd_dir</code>

</li>

<h5 md-src-pos="14894..14959">
<a name="allow_encoded_slashes"></a>
<code md-src-pos="14936..14959">allow_encoded_slashes</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="14961..15013">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="14972..15013">Optional[Enum['on', 'off', 'nodecode']]</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="15015..15284">
Sets the server default for the <code md-src-pos="15047..15068">AllowEncodedSlashes</code>
 declaration, which modifies the
responses to URLs containing '' and '/' characters. If not specified, this parameter omits
the declaration from the server's configuration and uses Apache's default setting of 'off'.</p>
<p md-src-pos="15286..15310">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="15301..15310">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="15312..15363">
<a name="apache_version"></a>
<code md-src-pos="15347..15363">apache_version</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="15365..15381">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="15376..15381">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="15383..15575">Configures module template behavior, package names, and default Apache modules by defining
the version of Apache to use. We do not recommend manually configuring this parameter
without reason.</p>
<p md-src-pos="15577..15619">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="15592..15619">$apache::version::default</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="15621..15660">
<a name="conf_dir"></a>
<code md-src-pos="15650..15660">conf_dir</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="15662..15678">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="15673..15678">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="15680..15760">Sets the directory where the Apache server's main configuration file is located.</p>
<p md-src-pos="15762..15804">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="15777..15804">$apache::params::conf_dir</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="15806..15855">
<a name="conf_template"></a>
<code md-src-pos="15840..15855">conf_template</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="15857..15873">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="15868..15873">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="15875..16088">
Defines the template used for the main Apache configuration file. Modifying this
parameter is potentially risky, as the apache module is designed to use a minimal
configuration file customized by <code md-src-pos="16071..16079">conf.d</code>
 entries.</p>
<p md-src-pos="16090..16137">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="16105..16137">$apache::params::conf_template</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="16139..16180">
<a name="confd_dir"></a>
<code md-src-pos="16169..16180">confd_dir</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="16182..16198">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="16193..16198">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="16200..16272">Sets the location of the Apache server's custom configuration directory.</p>
<p md-src-pos="16274..16317">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="16289..16317">$apache::params::confd_dir</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="16319..16372">
<a name="default_charset"></a>
<code md-src-pos="16355..16372">default_charset</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="16374..16390">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="16385..16390">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="16392..16465">
Used as the <code md-src-pos="16404..16423">AddDefaultCharset</code>
 directive in the main configuration file.</p>
<p md-src-pos="16467..16491">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="16482..16491">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="16493..16554">
<a name="default_confd_files"></a>
<code md-src-pos="16533..16554">default_confd_files</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="16556..16576">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="16567..16576">Boolean</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="16578..16849">
Determines whether Puppet generates a default set of includable Apache configuration files
in the directory defined by the <code md-src-pos="16701..16712">confd_dir</code>
 parameter. These configuration files
correspond to what is typically installed with the Apache package on the server's
operating system.</p>
<p md-src-pos="16851..16874">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="16866..16874">true</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="16876..16923">
<a name="default_mods"></a>
<code md-src-pos="16909..16923">default_mods</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="16925..16941">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="16936..16941">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="16943..17653">
Determines whether to configure and enable a set of default Apache modules depending on
your operating system.<br />

If <code md-src-pos="17063..17070">false</code>
, Puppet includes only the Apache modules required to make the HTTP daemon work
on your operating system, and you can declare any other modules separately using the
<code md-src-pos="17235..17263">apache::mod::&lt;MODULE NAME&gt;</code>
 class or <code md-src-pos="17273..17286">apache::mod</code>
 defined type.<br />

If <code md-src-pos="17310..17316">true</code>
, Puppet installs additional modules, depending on the operating system and
the values of <code md-src-pos="17406..17422">apache_version</code>
 and <code md-src-pos="17427..17439">mpm_module</code>
 parameters. Because these lists of
modules can change frequently, consult the Puppet module's code for up-to-date lists.<br />
If this parameter contains an array, Puppet instead enables all passed Apache modules.</p>
<p md-src-pos="17655..17678">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="17670..17678">true</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="17680..17731">
<a name="default_ssl_ca"></a>
<code md-src-pos="17715..17731">default_ssl_ca</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="17733..17749">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="17744..17749">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="17751..18022">
Sets the default certificate authority for the Apache server.<br />

Although the default value results in a functioning Apache server, you <strong md-src-pos="17890..17898">must</strong>
 update
this parameter with your certificate authority information before deploying this server in
a production environment.</p>
<p md-src-pos="18024..18048">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="18039..18048">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="18050..18105">
<a name="default_ssl_cert"></a>
<code md-src-pos="18087..18105">default_ssl_cert</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="18107..18123">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="18118..18123">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="18125..18367">
Sets the SSL encryption certificate location.<br />

Although the default value results in a functioning Apache server, you <strong md-src-pos="18248..18256">must</strong>
 update this
parameter with your certificate location before deploying this server in a production environment.</p>
<p md-src-pos="18369..18419">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="18384..18419">$apache::params::default_ssl_cert</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="18421..18478">
<a name="default_ssl_chain"></a>
<code md-src-pos="18459..18478">default_ssl_chain</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="18480..18496">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="18491..18496">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="18498..18721">
Sets the default SSL chain location.<br />

Although this default value results in a functioning Apache server, you <strong md-src-pos="18613..18621">must</strong>
 update
this parameter with your SSL chain before deploying this server in a production environment.</p>
<p md-src-pos="18723..18747">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="18738..18747">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="18749..18802">
<a name="default_ssl_crl"></a>
<code md-src-pos="18785..18802">default_ssl_crl</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="18804..18820">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="18815..18820">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="18822..19162">
Sets the path of the default certificate revocation list (CRL) file to use.<br />

Although this default value results in a functioning Apache server, you <strong md-src-pos="18976..18984">must</strong>
 update
this parameter with the CRL file path before deploying this server in a production
environment. You can use this parameter with or in place of the <code md-src-pos="19139..19161">default_ssl_crl_path</code>
.</p>
<p md-src-pos="19164..19188">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="19179..19188">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="19190..19253">
<a name="default_ssl_crl_path"></a>
<code md-src-pos="19231..19253">default_ssl_crl_path</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="19255..19271">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="19266..19271">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="19273..19540">
Sets the server's certificate revocation list path, which contains your CRLs.<br />

Although this default value results in a functioning Apache server, you <strong md-src-pos="19429..19437">must</strong>
 update
this parameter with the CRL file path before deploying this server in a production environment.</p>
<p md-src-pos="19542..19566">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="19557..19566">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="19568..19633">
<a name="default_ssl_crl_check"></a>
<code md-src-pos="19610..19633">default_ssl_crl_check</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="19635..19651">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="19646..19651">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="19653..20011">
Sets the default certificate revocation check level via the <code md-src-pos="19713..19735">SSLCARevocationCheck</code>
 directive.
This parameter applies only to Apache 2.4 or higher and is ignored on older versions.<br />

Although this default value results in a functioning Apache server, you <strong md-src-pos="19911..19919">must</strong>
 specify
this parameter when using certificate revocation lists in a production environment.</p>
<p md-src-pos="20013..20037">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="20028..20037">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="20039..20092">
<a name="default_ssl_key"></a>
<code md-src-pos="20075..20092">default_ssl_key</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="20094..20110">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="20105..20110">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="20112..20344">
Sets the SSL certificate key file location.
Although the default values result in a functioning Apache server, you <strong md-src-pos="20227..20235">must</strong>
 update
this parameter with your SSL key's location before deploying this server in a production
environment.</p>
<p md-src-pos="20346..20395">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="20361..20395">$apache::params::default_ssl_key</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="20397..20454">
<a name="default_ssl_vhost"></a>
<code md-src-pos="20435..20454">default_ssl_vhost</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="20456..20476">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="20467..20476">Boolean</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="20478..20626">
Configures a default SSL virtual host.
If <code md-src-pos="20520..20526">true</code>
, Puppet automatically configures the following virtual host using the
<code md-src-pos="20597..20612">apache::vhost</code>
 defined type:</p>
<pre><code class="language-puppet" md-src-pos="20627..20874">apache::vhost { 'default-ssl':
  port            =&gt; 443,
  ssl             =&gt; true,
  docroot         =&gt; $docroot,
  scriptalias     =&gt; $scriptalias,
  serveradmin     =&gt; $serveradmin,
  access_log_file =&gt; &quot;ssl_${access_log_file}&quot;,
}
</code></pre>
<p md-src-pos="20875..20933">
<strong md-src-pos="20875..20883">Note</strong>
: SSL virtual hosts only respond to HTTPS queries.</p>
<p md-src-pos="20935..20959">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="20950..20959">false</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="20961..21008">
<a name="default_type"></a>
<code md-src-pos="20994..21008">default_type</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="21010..21026">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="21021..21026">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="21028..21270">
<em md-src-pos="21028..21045">Apache 2.2 only</em>
. Sets the MIME <code md-src-pos="21061..21075">content-type</code>
 sent if the server cannot otherwise
determine an appropriate <code md-src-pos="21137..21151">content-type</code>
. This directive is deprecated in Apache 2.4 and
newer, and is only for backwards compatibility in configuration files.</p>
<p md-src-pos="21272..21295">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="21287..21295">'none'</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="21297..21346">
<a name="default_vhost"></a>
<code md-src-pos="21331..21346">default_vhost</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="21348..21368">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="21359..21368">Boolean</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="21370..21521">
Configures a default virtual host when the class is declared.<br />

To configure customized virtual hosts, set this parameter's
value to <code md-src-pos="21507..21514">false</code>
.<br /></p>
<blockquote md-src-pos="21522..21662">
<p md-src-pos="21524..21662">
<strong md-src-pos="21524..21532">Note</strong>
: Apache will not start without at least one virtual host. If you set this
to <code md-src-pos="21610..21617">false</code>
 you must configure a virtual host elsewhere.</p>
</blockquote>
<p md-src-pos="21664..21687">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="21679..21687">true</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="21689..21736">
<a name="dev_packages"></a>
<code md-src-pos="21722..21736">dev_packages</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="21738..21754">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="21749..21754">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="21756..21861">
Configures a specific dev package to use.<br />

For example, using httpd 2.4 from the IUS yum repo:<br /></p>
<pre><code class="language-puppet" md-src-pos="21862..21984">include ::apache::dev
class { 'apache':
  apache_name  =&gt; 'httpd24u',
  dev_packages =&gt; 'httpd24u-devel',
}
</code></pre>
<p md-src-pos="21986..22032">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="22001..22032">$apache::params::dev_packages</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="22034..22071">
<a name="docroot"></a>
<code md-src-pos="22062..22071">docroot</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="22073..22089">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="22084..22089">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="22091..22132">
Sets the default <code md-src-pos="22108..22122">DocumentRoot</code>
 location.</p>
<p md-src-pos="22134..22175">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="22149..22175">$apache::params::docroot</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="22177..22230">
<a name="error_documents"></a>
<code md-src-pos="22213..22230">error_documents</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="22232..22248">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="22243..22248">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="22250..22382">
Determines whether to enable <a href="https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/custom-error.html" md-src-pos="22279..22360">custom error documents</a>
 on the Apache server.</p>
<p md-src-pos="22384..22408">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="22399..22408">false</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="22410..22443">
<a name="group"></a>
<code md-src-pos="22436..22443">group</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="22445..22461">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="22456..22461">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="22463..22887">
Sets the group ID that owns any Apache processes spawned to answer requests.<br />

By default, Puppet attempts to manage this group as a resource under the <code md-src-pos="22619..22627">apache</code>

class, determining the group based on the operating system as detected by the
<code md-src-pos="22706..22722">apache::params</code>
 class. To prevent the group resource from being created and use a group
created by another Puppet module, set the <code md-src-pos="22837..22851">manage_group</code>
 parameter's value to <code md-src-pos="22873..22880">false</code>
.<br /></p>
<blockquote md-src-pos="22888..23078">
<p md-src-pos="22890..23078">
<strong md-src-pos="22890..22898">Note</strong>
: Modifying this parameter only changes the group ID that Apache uses to spawn
child processes to access resources. It does not change the user that owns the parent server
process.</p>
</blockquote>
<p md-src-pos="23080..23119">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="23095..23119">$apache::params::group</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="23121..23162">
<a name="httpd_dir"></a>
<code md-src-pos="23151..23162">httpd_dir</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="23164..23180">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="23175..23180">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="23182..23390">Sets the Apache server's base configuration directory. This is useful for specially
repackaged Apache server builds but might have unintended consequences when combined
with the default distribution packages.</p>
<p md-src-pos="23392..23435">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="23407..23435">$apache::params::httpd_dir</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="23437..23502">
<a name="http_protocol_options"></a>
<code md-src-pos="23479..23502">http_protocol_options</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="23504..23520">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="23515..23520">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="23522..23737">
Specifies the strictness of HTTP protocol checks.<br />

Valid options: any sequence of the following alternative values: <code md-src-pos="23643..23651">Strict</code>
 or <code md-src-pos="23655..23663">Unsafe</code>
,
<code md-src-pos="23665..23684">RegisteredMethods</code>
 or <code md-src-pos="23688..23704">LenientMethods</code>
, and <code md-src-pos="23710..23720">Allow0.9</code>
 or <code md-src-pos="23724..23736">Require1.0</code>
.</p>
<p md-src-pos="23739..23794">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="23754..23794">$apache::params::http_protocol_options</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="23796..23837">
<a name="keepalive"></a>
<code md-src-pos="23826..23837">keepalive</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="23839..23855">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="23850..23855">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="23857..24069">
Determines whether to enable persistent HTTP connections with the <code md-src-pos="23923..23934">KeepAlive</code>
 directive.
If you set this to <code md-src-pos="23965..23969">On</code>
, use the <code md-src-pos="23979..23998">keepalive_timeout</code>
 and <code md-src-pos="24003..24027">max_keepalive_requests</code>
 parameters
to set relevant options.<br /></p>
<p md-src-pos="24071..24114">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="24086..24114">$apache::params::keepalive</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="24116..24173">
<a name="keepalive_timeout"></a>
<code md-src-pos="24154..24173">keepalive_timeout</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="24175..24191">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="24186..24191">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="24193..24421">
Sets the <code md-src-pos="24202..24220">KeepAliveTimeout</code>
 directive, which determines the amount of time the Apache
server waits for subsequent requests on a persistent HTTP connection. This parameter is
only relevant if the <code md-src-pos="24388..24399">keepalive</code>
 parameter is enabled.</p>
<p md-src-pos="24423..24474">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="24438..24474">$apache::params::keepalive_timeout</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="24476..24543">
<a name="max_keepalive_requests"></a>
<code md-src-pos="24519..24543">max_keepalive_requests</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="24545..24561">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="24556..24561">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="24563..24658">
Limits the number of requests allowed per connection when the <code md-src-pos="24625..24636">keepalive</code>
 parameter is enabled.</p>
<p md-src-pos="24660..24716">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="24675..24716">$apache::params::max_keepalive_requests</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="24718..24773">
<a name="hostname_lookups"></a>
<code md-src-pos="24755..24773">hostname_lookups</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="24775..24838">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="24786..24838">Enum['Off', 'On', 'Double', 'off', 'on', 'double']</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="24840..24953">
This directive enables DNS lookups so that host names can be logged and passed to
CGIs/SSIs in REMOTE_HOST.<br /></p>
<blockquote md-src-pos="24954..25015">
<p md-src-pos="24956..25015">
<strong md-src-pos="24956..24964">Note</strong>
: If enabled, it impacts performance significantly.</p>
</blockquote>
<p md-src-pos="25017..25067">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="25032..25067">$apache::params::hostname_lookups</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="25069..25126">
<a name="ldap_trusted_mode"></a>
<code md-src-pos="25107..25126">ldap_trusted_mode</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="25128..25144">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="25139..25144">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="25146..25180">The following modes are supported:</p>
<p md-src-pos="25182..25465">NONE - no encryption
SSL - ldaps:// encryption on default port 636
TLS - STARTTLS encryption on default port 389
Not all LDAP toolkits support all the above modes. An error message will be logged at
runtime if a mode is not supported, and the connection to the LDAP server will fail.</p>
<p md-src-pos="25467..25491">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="25482..25491">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="25493..25562">
<a name="ldap_verify_server_cert"></a>
<code md-src-pos="25537..25562">ldap_verify_server_cert</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="25564..25580">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="25575..25580">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="25582..25712">Specifies whether to force the verification of a server certificate when establishing an SSL
connection to the LDAP server.
On|Off</p>
<p md-src-pos="25714..25738">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="25729..25738">undef</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="25740..25779">
<a name="lib_path"></a>
<code md-src-pos="25769..25779">lib_path</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="25781..25797">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="25792..25797">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="25799..25864">
Specifies the location whereApache module files are stored.<br /></p>
<blockquote md-src-pos="25865..25941">
<p md-src-pos="25867..25941">
<strong md-src-pos="25867..25875">Note</strong>
: Do not configure this parameter manually without special reason.</p>
</blockquote>
<p md-src-pos="25943..25985">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="25958..25985">$apache::params::lib_path</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="25987..26028">
<a name="log_level"></a>
<code md-src-pos="26017..26028">log_level</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="26030..26059">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="26041..26059">Apache::LogLevel</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="26061..26237">
Configures the apache <a href="https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/core.html#loglevel" md-src-pos="26083..26155">LogLevel</a>
 directive
which adjusts the verbosity of the messages recorded in the error logs.</p>
<p md-src-pos="26239..26282">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="26254..26282">$apache::params::log_level</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="26284..26329">
<a name="log_formats"></a>
<code md-src-pos="26316..26329">log_formats</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="26331..26347">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="26342..26347">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="26349..26415">
Define additional <code md-src-pos="26367..26378">LogFormat</code>
 directives. Values: A hash, such as:</p>
<pre><code class="language-puppet" md-src-pos="26416..26496">$log_formats = { vhost_common =&gt; '%v %h %l %u %t \&quot;%r\&quot; %&gt;s %b' }
</code></pre>
<p md-src-pos="26497..26583">
There are a number of predefined <code md-src-pos="26530..26542">LogFormats</code>
 in the <code md-src-pos="26550..26562">httpd.conf</code>
 that Puppet creates:</p>
<pre><code class="language-httpd" md-src-pos="26584..26904">  LogFormat &quot;%h %l %u %t \&quot;%r\&quot; %&gt;s %b \&quot;%{Referer}i\&quot; \&quot;%{User-Agent}i\&quot;&quot; combined
  LogFormat &quot;%h %l %u %t \&quot;%r\&quot; %&gt;s %b&quot; common
  LogFormat &quot;%{Referer}i -&gt; %U&quot; referer
  LogFormat &quot;%{User-agent}i&quot; agent
  LogFormat &quot;%{X-Forwarded-For}i %l %u %t \&quot;%r\&quot; %s %b \&quot;%{Referer}i\&quot; \&quot;%{User-agent}i\&quot;&quot; forwarded
</code></pre>
<p md-src-pos="26905..27008">
If your <code md-src-pos="26913..26926">log_formats</code>
 parameter contains one of those, it will be overwritten with <strong md-src-pos="26988..26996">your</strong>
 definition.</p>
<p md-src-pos="27010..27029">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="27025..27029">{}</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="27031..27068">
<a name="logroot"></a>
<code md-src-pos="27059..27068">logroot</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="27070..27086">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="27081..27086">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="27088..27151">Changes the directory of Apache log files for the virtual host.</p>
<p md-src-pos="27153..27194">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="27168..27194">$apache::params::logroot</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="27196..27243">
<a name="logroot_mode"></a>
<code md-src-pos="27229..27243">logroot_mode</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="27245..27261">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="27256..27261">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="27263..27318">
Overrides the default <code md-src-pos="27285..27294">logroot</code>
 directory's mode.<br /></p>
<blockquote md-src-pos="27319..27544">
<p md-src-pos="27321..27544">
<strong md-src-pos="27321..27329">Note</strong>
: Do <em md-src-pos="27334..27339">not</em>
 grant write access to the directory where the logs are stored
without being aware of the consequences. See the <a href="https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/logs.html#security" md-src-pos="27451..27531">Apache documentation</a>

for details.</p>
</blockquote>
<p md-src-pos="27546..27592">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="27561..27592">$apache::params::logroot_mode</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="27594..27641">
<a name="manage_group"></a>
<code md-src-pos="27627..27641">manage_group</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="27643..27663">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="27654..27663">Boolean</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="27665..27955">
When <code md-src-pos="27670..27677">false</code>
, stops Puppet from creating the group resource.<br />

If you have a group created from another Puppet module that you want to use to run Apache,
set this to <code md-src-pos="27835..27842">false</code>
. Without this parameter, attempting to use a previously established
group results in a duplicate resource error.</p>
<p md-src-pos="27957..27980">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="27972..27980">true</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="27982..28045">
<a name="supplementary_groups"></a>
<code md-src-pos="28023..28045">supplementary_groups</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="28047..28063">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="28058..28063">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="28065..28239">
A list of groups to which the user belongs. These groups are in addition to the primary group.<br />

Notice: This option only has an effect when <code md-src-pos="28210..28223">manage_user</code>
 is set to true.</p>
<p md-src-pos="28241..28260">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="28256..28260">[]</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="28262..28307">
<a name="manage_user"></a>
<code md-src-pos="28294..28307">manage_user</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="28309..28329">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="28320..28329">Boolean</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="28331..28623">
When <code md-src-pos="28336..28343">false</code>
, stops Puppet from creating the user resource.<br />
This is for instances when you have a user, created from another Puppet module, you want
to use to run Apache. Without this parameter, attempting to use a previously established
user would result in a duplicate resource error.</p>
<p md-src-pos="28625..28648">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="28640..28648">true</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="28650..28687">
<a name="mod_dir"></a>
<code md-src-pos="28678..28687">mod_dir</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="28689..28705">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="28700..28705">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="28707..28776">Sets where Puppet places configuration files for your Apache modules.</p>
<p md-src-pos="28778..28819">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="28793..28819">$apache::params::mod_dir</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="28821..28860">
<a name="mod_libs"></a>
<code md-src-pos="28850..28860">mod_libs</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="28862..28878">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="28873..28878">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="28880..28937">Allows the user to override default module library names.</p>
<pre><code class="language-puppet" md-src-pos="28938..29087">include apache::params
class { 'apache':
  mod_libs =&gt; merge($::apache::params::mod_libs, {
    'wsgi' =&gt; 'mod_wsgi_python3.so',
  })
}
</code></pre>
<p md-src-pos="29089..29131">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="29104..29131">$apache::params::mod_libs</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="29133..29180">
<a name="mod_packages"></a>
<code md-src-pos="29166..29180">mod_packages</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="29182..29198">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="29193..29198">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="29200..29257">Allows the user to override default module package names.</p>
<pre><code class="language-puppet" md-src-pos="29258..29422">include apache::params
class { 'apache':
  mod_packages =&gt; merge($::apache::params::mod_packages, {
    'auth_kerb' =&gt; 'httpd24-mod_auth_kerb',
  })
}
</code></pre>
<p md-src-pos="29424..29470">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="29439..29470">$apache::params::mod_packages</code>
</p>
<h5 md-src-pos="29472..29515">
<a name="mpm_module"></a>
<code md-src-pos="29503..29515">mpm_module</code>
</h5>
<p md-src-pos="29517..29533">
Data type: <code md-src-pos="29528..29533">Any</code>
</p>
<p md-src-pos="29535..29859">
Determines which <a href="https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mpm.html" md-src-pos="29552..29625">multi-processing module</a>
 (MPM) is loaded and configured for the
HTTPD process. Valid values are: <code md-src-pos="29698..29705">event</code>
, <code md-src-pos="29707..29712">itk</code>
, <code md-src-pos="29714..29723">peruser</code>
, <code md-src-pos="29725..29734">prefork</code>
, <code md-src-pos="29736..29744">worker</code>
 or <code md-src-pos="29748..29755">false</code>
.<br />

You must set this to <code md-src-pos="29784..29791">false</code>
 to explicitly declare the following classes with custom parameters:</p>
<ul md-src-pos="29860..29977">
<li md-src-pos="29860..29882">
<code md-src-pos="29862..29882">apache::mod::event</code>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="29883..29903">
<code md-src-pos="29885..29903">apache::mod::itk</code>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="29904..29928">
<code md-src-pos="29906..29928">apache::mod::peruser</code>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="29929..29953">
<code md-src-pos="29931..29953">apache::mod::prefork</code>
</li>
<li md-src-pos="29954..29977">
<code md-src-pos="29956..29977">apache::mod::worker</code>
</li>
</ul>
<p md-src-pos="29979..30023">
Default value: <code md-src-pos="29994..30023">$apache::params::mpm_module</code>
</p>
</body>
